title: Ticket #5891: 50 Chirp attributes ought to be enough for anyone
description:
I mean, it seemed reasonable enough at the time - who would want more than 50 Chirp* attributes set anyway?

CMS, that's who.

Can we bump up the defaults to 100 attributes and make it a configurable knob? I would appreciate it if this could go in both stable and dev series, since we tend to be more conservative on the glidein condor version.
remarks:

Yep, we can do this, patch incoming shortly....
